source.name: Bronx - Cool Roofs
source.description: Bronx locations of buildings participating in the Cool Roofs initiative. NYC Cool Roofs buildings have a reflective surface applied to their rooftop, helping to reduce cooling costs, cut energy usage and lower greenhouse gas emissions.
